mapper.insert: insert into tbl_fleamarketcomment(fleamarketcommentseq, fleamarketseq, comment_text, registerdate, fk_userid) values(seq_fleamarketcomment.nextval, 1, #{comment_text}, default, #{fk_userid})
mapper.update: update tbl_fleamarket set commentcount = commentcount+1 where fleamarketseq = 1
mapper.select: select fleamarketcommentseq, fk_userid, comment_text , to_char(registerdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS registerdate , V.memberimg from tbl_fleamarketcomment A join tbl_member V ON A.fk_userid = V.userid where A.fleamarketseq = #{parentSeq} order by fleamarketcommentseq desc
